wikipedia_page.main: Ryan Dominic Blair (born 23 February 1996) is a Scottish professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for East Fife.

response: Ryan Blair (born July 14, 1977) is an American entrepreneur and author. He is the former co-founder and chief executive officer of the multi-level marketing company ViSalus Sciences, a subsidiary of the publicly traded company Blyth, Inc.

The Blair Foundation, a nonprofit Ryan Blair founded, donates to programs that support at-risk kids and families. Through the Blair Foundation, he works closely with Urban Born, a nonprofit that helps at-risk youth and teens put an end to drug use and avoid gangs, while promoting education and healthy living. He also donates through this initiative to support ex-gang members.
